subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=군|eumhun=|rv=gun|mr=kun|y=kwun}}

# ([[무리|무리]]<ref>Compare Japanese ''Kun'' [[群れ]] ([[むれ]], ''mure'', "[[crowd]]"). </ref> 군): [[group]], [[crowd]], [[horde]], [[herd]], [[flock]], [[folk]], [[people]], [[mob]]
# ([[무리|무리]][[짓다|질]]<ref>Compare Japanese ''Kun'' [[群れる]] ([[むれる]], ''mureru'', "to [[crowd]]"). </ref> 군): to [[crowd]], [[flock]], [[gather]], [[assemble]]
# ([[많다|많을]] 군): [[multitude]]
